Zaire - Projet Mais Au Kasai Oriental

abstracts.cdata!:
The Smallholder Maize Project in Zaire
            aimed to improve existing farming systems in the Kasai
            Oriental Region, increase maize production from about 80,000
            tons to about 120,000 tons per annum, and increase
            participating farmer's income. Overall, project results
            were disappointing. The project was unable to achieve its
            objective of increasing maize production on a sustainable
            basis and thus increase farmer's incomes. No adequate
            extension package for this purpose was developed; extension
            activities concentrated on encouraging the use of improved
            seeds and fertilizer while inadequate supplies of either
            were available. Incomplete data shows that maize production
            increases were mainly due to an increase in area planted and
            that actual yields for maize fell during project
            implementation. In the absence of a suitable production
            package, the envisaged modification of farming systems and
            the introduction of mixed cropping was given insufficient
            attention. Farmer's incomes are not likely to have
            improved as a result of the project. Despite agreements
            reached with the Borrower, the practice of forced cotton
            planting continued throughout the project, albeit at reduced
            levels. This had a negative impact on maize production,
            because the farmer was unable to spend sufficient time on
            his maize fields. The experiments with animal traction had
            limited success and were finally handed over to local non
            governmental organizations (NGOs). The project was
            successful in its rehabilitation and construction of manual
            drinking water supply systems, which besides providing labor
            savings, also had a public health impact. The extent and
            impact of the roads component is unknown.
